definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

sentences.english: We have all come a long way, "ten thousand crags and torrents" (a long and difficult road) to get here.
sentences.chinese: 我们都来自五湖四海，经历万水千山，来到了这里。

sentences.english: SzMix club DJ all is comes from all corners of the country.
sentences.chinese: 深圳混音俱乐部的DJ都是来自五湖四海。

sentences.english: Wan Min jubilation, cheered, China's north and south corners of the country spring tide surging.
sentences.chinese: 万民欢腾，欢呼雀跃，中国南北，五湖四海春潮涌动。

sentences.english: With it, I know from a lot of new friends from all corners of the country.
sentences.chinese: 有了它，我结识了一大堆来自五湖四海的新朋友。

sentences.english: Sincerely welcome friends all over the world to visit our company.
sentences.chinese: 真诚欢迎五湖四海的朋友光临惠顾。

sentences.english: Yan Jiang Inn brand new decoration to welcome guests to all corners of the country.
sentences.chinese: 雁江客栈以全新的装修，欢迎五湖四海宾客的光临。

definition: see 天南地北[tian1 nan2 di4 bei3]
distant places/all over the country/(to talk) about this and that
to gather happily under one roof
the eight points of the compass/all directions
to come to a place on account of its reputation (idiom); attracted to visit a famous location

pinyin: si4 hai3 zhi1 nei4 jie1 xiong1 di4

definition: foreign land/a place far from home
lit. each color and each form (idiom)/diverse/various/all kinds of
see 天涯海角[tian1 ya2 hai3 jiao3]
